mapper.insert: insert into project(user_id, title, detail, start_date, end_date, reg_date, mod_date) values(#{user_id}, #{title}, #{detail}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, now(), now())
insert into team(peer_id, role, no, status) values(#{peer_id}, #{role}, #{no}, COALESCE(#{status}, 'WAIT'))
mapper.select: select name, id, mail from user where name like concat('%', #{peerName}, '%')

select u.id, u.name, u.mail, u.phone, u.team, u.image, u.grade, p.no, t.role, t.status from team t join project p on t.no = p.no right outer join user u on t.peer_id = u.id where p.no = #{no} union select u.id, u.name, u.mail, u.phone, u.team, u.image, u.grade, p.no, null as role, null as status from user u join project p on p.user_id = u.id where p.user_id = #{owner} and p.no = #{no};
mapper.delete: delete from project where no = #{no} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select u.name as owner_name, u.id as owner_id, u.image owner_image, t.status as status, p.title as project_title, p.start_date as start_date, p.end_date as end_date, t.peer_id as user_id from team t left join project p on t.no = p.no left join user u on p.user_id = u.id where t.peer_id = #{user_id};
